title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit, a stylish and functional addition to any indoor or outdoor setting!

This mini tabletop fire pit is made from durable concrete in a sleek graphite color, with a marble effect base for a touch of elegance. The fire pit uses bio ethanol fuel, with roundfire premium bioethanol fuels with safety flashback arrestors recommended for optimal performance. With a burn time of over 1 hour, you can enjoy the warmth and ambiance of this fire pit for extended periods.

The Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit is designed with safety in mind. The burn cup is made from stainless steel, and the fire pit features rapid cooling of the burn chamber for added peace of mind. The included flat stainless steel extinguisher tool makes it easy to put out the flame when you're done enjoying the fire pit.

This fire pit is not only functional, but also versatile. It's portable, making it easy to move from indoors to the garden and back again. Plus, the heat dissipating base helps protect your tabletop from heat damage. And with the ability to cook smores and marshmallows, this fire pit is perfect for creating a warm and cozy atmosphere for any gathering.

Upgrade your tabletop decor and atmosphere with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit today!
